phrs.translation: 土风舞, 英国舞曲, 英国舞, 斜体书法
马德拉刺绣, 英格兰刺绣
英格兰奶油, 英式奶油酱, 英格兰奶油酱

sentences.sentence: The French aristocracy then learned of these useful items from their English friends and called them "Capote Anglaise" - English Raincoats.
sentences.translation: 法国贵族后来从他们英国朋友处得知这些有用玩意，并将之称为“英国雨衣”。

sentences.sentence: My father drove the same car in his later years and, since he died before Sara met him, I thought she could commune with him on a kind of spiritual voyage a la facon anglaise.
sentences.translation: 我父亲晚年时开过一模一样的车。由于萨拉在他去世前并没见过他，我觉得她能通过这场心灵上的英式旅行与他相互交流。
